![](img/hex-pad.png){width="400"} [(old website)](https://ha-data-science.github.io/)
**HARUG!** is the Harper Adams R User Group This site is devoted to the R programming, Python, Statistics and Data Science community at Harper Adams University. We meet Wednesdays at 4pm UK time on Teams and via our Slack workspace anytime. ![](img/slack.png){width="40"} [Slack workspace: Join us](https://join.slack.com/t/harper-adams-rug/shared_invite/zt-azcm9z6s-WsY9JXvAs8DW1DLQuU3USg) (kindly register with your real name, e.g. "Ronald Fisher") ![](img/youtube.png){width="40"} [Youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOEuOH6cY8yisodud25hb7w) - Research methods in statistics and AI applications - Build data analysis skills and capacity - Group problem solving, live coding - Tutorials and resource sharing - Community

This group is supported by the research and teaching community at [Harper Adams University](https://www.harper-adams.ac.uk/ "Harper Adams University") and by students and alumnists of the [MSc in Data Science for Global Agriculture, Food, and Environment](https://www.harper-adams.ac.uk/courses/postgraduate/201194/data-science-for-global-agriculture-food-and-environment "MSc in Data Science"), and is led by [Ed Harris](https://www.harper-adams.ac.uk/general/staff/profile/201620/Edwin-Harris/ "Ed's Faculty page").
